summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5577 for the improvement of East 42nd Street, from 48th Avenue Northeast to 50th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 73148, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
